Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (57.14%) toCombi-2W=R: 50%.Activity: active against E. coli KCTC 1682  (MIC 3.8 uM),  P. aeruginosa KCTC 1637 (MIC 15.3 uM), S. epidermidis KCTC 1917 (MIC 7.7 uM), and S. aureus KCTC 1621 (MIC 7.7 uM).Toxicity: human RBC; HC10 > 245.2 uM. non-hemo.lytic
Literature Information.Author: Murugan RN, Jacob B, Kim EH, Ahn M, Sohn H, Seo JH, Cheong C, Hyun JK, Lee KS, Shin SY, Bang JK.2013
Literature Information.Reference: Non hemolytic short peptidomimetics as a new class of potent and broad-spectrum antimicrobial agents.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Non hemolytic short peptidomimetics as a new class of potent and broad-spectrum antimicrobial agents.
